drupalNodeEvent.title: WildChina Book Club: Leading Through Culture with Ken Wilcox

field_description.processed: For our October book club, join us in reading the latest book by finance mogul Ken Wilcox, Leading Through Culture. This influential book looks at how real leaders can create cultures that motivate people to achieve great things. Wilcox offers insights from his experience as CEO of Silicon Valley Bank and co-founder of a Shanghai joint-venture bank devoted to advising tech companies in China. We'll be sitting down with the author himself to discuss his leadership philosophies, his time living in Shanghai, and his passion for educating the world about Asia.
